This is a testharness.js-based test.
FAIL getDisplayMedia() in a discarded browsing context assert_throws_dom: function "() => { throw rejected_reason }" threw object "NotSupportedError: Failed to execute 'getDisplayMedia' on 'MediaDevices': No media device controller available; is this a detached window?" that is not a DOMException InvalidStateError: property "code" is equal to 9, expected 11
Harness: the test ran to completion.
